Verses: 1 pinnum Karththar Ennai Nokki: Nee Oru Periya Paththiraththai Eduththu Manushan Ezhudhugira Pragaaramaai Adhile Mager-saalaal-ash-paas Endru Ezhudhu Endraar.
2 appozhudhu Naan Unmaiyulla Saatchikkaararaagiya Aasaariyanaana Uriyaavaiyum, Yeperegiyaavin Kumaaranaana Sagariyaavaiyum Adharku Saatchigalaaga Vaiththukkonden.
3 naan Theerkkadharisiyaanavalai Serndhapodhu, Aval Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal; Appozhudhu Karththar Ennai Nokki: Mager-saalaal-ash-paas Ennum Perai Avanukku Idu.
4 indhap Paalagan, Appaa, Ammaa Endru Kooppida Ariyumunne, Thamaskuvin Aasthiyum, Samaariyaavin Kollaiyum, Aseeriyaavin Raajaavukku Munbaagak Kondupogappadum Endraar.
5 pinnum Karththar Ennai Nokki:
6 indha Janam Medhuvaai Odugira Seelovaavin Thanneergalai Asattaipanni, Redhseenaiyum Remaliyaavin Kumaaranaiyum Saarndhu Sandhoshikkirapadiyinaal,

7 idho, Aandavar Vallamaiyulla Thiralaana Aatruneeraippondra Aseeriyaavin Raajaavaiyum, Avanudaiya Sagala Aadambaraththaiyum Avargalmel Puralappannuvaar; Adhu Avargaludaiya Odaigalellaavatrinmelum Poi, Avargaludaiya Ellaak Karaigalmelum Purandu,
8 yoodhaavukkul Pugundhu Pravaagiththuk Kadandhu, Kazhuththumattum Varum Endraar. Immaanuvele, Avan Settaigalin Virivu Umadhu Dhesaththin Visaalaththai Moodum.
9 janangale, Neengal Koottankoodungal, Muriyadikkappaduveergal; Dhoora Dhesaththaaraagiya Neengal Ellaarum Sevikodungal; Idaikkattikkollungal, Murindhoduveergal,
10 aalosanai Seyyungal, Adhu Abaththamaagum; Vaarththaiyai Vasaniyungal, Adhu Nirkaadhu; Dhevan Engalode Irukkiraar.
11 karththarudaiya Karam Enmel Amarndhu, Avar Ennudane Pesi, Naan Indha Janaththin Vazhiyile Nadavaadhapadi Enakku Buththisolli Vilambinadhaavadhu:
12 indha Janangal Kattuppaadu Endru Sollugiradhaiyellaam Neengal Kattuppaadu Endru Sollaamalum, Avargal Bayappadugira Bayaththinpadi Neengal Bayappadaamalum, Kalangaamalum,
13 senaigalin Karththaraiye Parisuththampannungal; Avare Ungal Bayamum Avare Ungal Achchamumaayiruppaar.
14 avar Ungalukkup Parisuththa Sthalamaayiruppaar; Aagilum Isravelin Irandu Koththiraththukkum Thadukkalin Kallum, Idarudhalin Kanmalaiyum, Erusalemin Kudigalukku Surukkum Kanniyumaayiruppaar.
15 avargalil Anegar Idari Vizhundhu Norungi Sikkundu Pidipaduvaargal.
16 saatchi Aagamaththaik Katti, En Seesharukkulle Vedhaththai Muththiraiyidu Endraar.
17 naano Yaakkobin Kudumbaththukkuth Thamadhu Mugaththai Maraikkira Karththarukkaagak Kaaththirundhu, Avarukku Edhirpaarththiruppen.
18 idho, Naanum, Karththar Enakkuk Koduththa Pillaigalum Seeyon Parvadhaththil Vaasamaayirukkira Senaigalin Karththaraale Isravelil Adaiyaalangalaagavum Arpudhangalaagavum Irukkirom.

19 avargal Ungalai Nokki: Anjanam Paarkkiravargalidaththilum, Munumunendru Odhugira Kurikaararidaththilum Visaariyungal Endru Sollumpodhu, Janangal Than Dhevanidaththil Visaarikkavendiyadhallavo? Uyirullavargalukkaaga Seththavargalidaththil Visaarikkalaamo?
20 vedhaththaiyum Saatchi Aagamaththaiyum Gavanikkavendum; Indha Vaarththaiyinpadiye Sollaavittaal, Avargalukku Vidiyarkaalaththu Velichchamillai.
21 idukkan Adaindhavargalaayum Pattiniyaayum Dhesaththaik Kadandhupovaargal; Avargal Pattiniyaayirukkumpodhu, Moorkkaverikondu, Thangal Raajaavaiyum Thangal Dhevanaiyum Dhooshippaargal.
22 avargal Annaandhu Paarppaargal, Boomiyaiyum Nokkip Paarppaargal; Aanaalum Idho, Ikkattum Andhagaaramum Irukkum; Idukkaththaal Iruladaindhu, Andhagaaraththile Thallundu Alaivaargal.
